attributes.action: Change or implement a law to stop one parent mum/dad denying to one another
attributes.additional_details:
It's only the government that can change or implement laws . This is a very serious matter people commit suicide for this reason as the mental stress of this it's not an easy way out it the hardest thing I think any man or woman could do .  The law needs to change . A positive change . 
That would in turn bring in money to the system if fines are imposed and it would deter people from doing such things in the future.  And on a daily basis people are dying over this mentally killing us
attributes.background:
The law needs to be changed or a law put in place to stop using children as weapons etc against one another wothold the children stop access for no reasons but. Cheating Arguing not getting on and financial gain . Needs to be a criminal law 
As the mental scars are just the same as physical scars

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Make parental alienation a specific criminal offence: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/633765

Automatically grant 50/50 to parents in separated households: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/632678
